overview_of_class: This course introduces students to the institutions and processes of American national government. The course explores the following core questions: What are the philosophical foundations of the American republic? How does America's constitutional design shape the functioning of the nation's institutions? What are the basic roles of the legislative, executive and judicial branches? What is the history of political parties in America? How are American public policies made?
name: American Government and Politics
subject: POLI_SCI
